title: I have an old fontographer... 4.1
content:
I can’t get it to work. I just recently installed it. I haven’t even gotten it to accept the S/N it gives me the message: Could not initialize the program because there is not enough memory available to run. code = -30202 I have 2 gigs of memory! I haven’t used Fontographer for 2 or 3 years. but I used to use it all the time. does anyone know what my problem could be?

author: jomboxx

comments.content:
Tell us about your computer. What processor and OS version are you running?  
Compatibility problems may have arisen between the old software and your new rig.
